title: Huckabee Blasts Liberal Policies Supporting Sanctuary Cities
title_page: Huckabee Blasts Liberal Policies Supporting Sanctuary Cities | Breitbart
text:
GOP presidential candidate and former Arkansas Gov. Mike Huckabee is criticizing liberal policies pertaining to sanctuary cities, following the shooting death of a woman in San Francisco, allegedly by a five time deported illegal immigrant.
Huckabee says the country must address the growing problem of illegal immigration.
In regard to the San Francisco killing, Huckabee’s press release stated this “tragedy never should have happened and reckless policy is to blame.”
“The horrible policies that have created sanctuary cities are a symptom of President Obama’s broader policy decision to ignore existing laws and issue radical unconstitutional executive orders that provide amnesty to the most dangerous illegal aliens,” Huckabee said. “What most people don’t realize is that existing laws provide more than enough leeway for the Executive branch to get the illegal immigration crisis under control.”
Huckabee vowed that as president, he would use his pen and phone to get illegal immigration under control.
